features.title: Structure
items: Steel –Sunvik or Kamadhenu Equivalent

features.title: Kitchen
items: Ceramic Wall Tiles -Upto Rs. 50/- Sqft
Kitchen accessories- Upto Rs.4,000/- ISI Marked
Kitchen Sink- Granite Sink worth Rs. 5,000/-

items: Bathroom Ceramic Wall Tiles – Upto Rs. 50/- per Sqft

CPVC Pipe- Astral or Equivalent
Bathroom doors- Waterproof flush doors(with 10 years warranty)
Geyser provisions included

features.title: Doors & Windows
items: Main Door- Teak wood frame and shutter of value – Rs.30,000/-
Internal Doors- Membrane Doors/ Flush Doors with laminates and fixtures.
Door frames of Sal Wood.
Windows- Basic UPVC Windows with Glass shutters and mesh Shutters (3 Track with 1 Mesh)
Pooja room door with polish.

features.title: Painting
items: Interior Painting- Primer coat+ Birla Putty + Latest Tractor Shyne Emulsion
External Painting- Asian Primer + Ace Exterior Emulsion Weather proof paint
Brand : Asian/Berger
